execution_quality: Thorough implementation with systematic debugging approach, but follow-up issues suggest incomplete testing or validation of the fixes before completion.

The work was focused and autonomous but didn't achieve the user's actual goal of fully functional music playback and settings management, requiring immediate follow-up debugging.
